title: Preview Creative Request
description: Request to generate previews of one or more creative manifests. Accepts either a single creative request or an array of requests for batch processing.

format_id.description: Format identifier for rendering the preview

creative_manifest.description: Complete creative manifest with all required assets (including promoted_offerings if required by the format)

inputs.description: Array of input sets for generating multiple preview variants. Each input set defines macros and context values for one preview rendering. If not provided, creative agent will generate default previews.

name.description: Human-readable name for this input set (e.g., 'Sunny morning on mobile', 'Evening podcast ad', 'Desktop dark mode')

macros.description: Macro values to use for this preview. Supports all universal macros from the format's supported_macros list. See docs/media-buy/creatives/universal-macros.md for available macros.

context_description.description: Natural language description of the context for AI-generated content (e.g., 'User just searched for running shoes', 'Podcast discussing weather patterns', 'Article about electric vehicles')

template_id.description: Specific template ID for custom format rendering

output_format.description: Output format for previews. 'url' returns preview_url (iframe-embeddable URL), 'html' returns preview_html (raw HTML for direct embedding). Default: 'url' for backward compatibility.

oneOf.description: Batch preview request for multiple creatives (5-10x faster than individual calls)

requests.description: Array of preview requests (1-50 items). Each follows the single request structure.

format_id.description: Format identifier for rendering the preview

creative_manifest.description: Complete creative manifest with all required assets

inputs.description: Array of input sets for generating multiple preview variants

name.description: Human-readable name for this input set

macros.description: Macro values to use for this preview

context_description.description: Natural language description of the context for AI-generated content

template_id.description: Specific template ID for custom format rendering

output_format.description: Output format for this preview. 'url' returns preview_url, 'html' returns preview_html.

Default output format for all requests in this batch. Individual requests can override this. 'url' returns preview_url (iframe-embeddable URL), 'html' returns preview_html (raw HTML for direct embedding).
